entities.description: Continued use of inhalants despite causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Use of inhalants increased chance of getting hurt in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time using methamphetamine or feeling its effects in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time trying to get or getting methamphetamine in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the use of inhalants to the behavioral impact of causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Relates the use of inhalants to an increased chance of getting hurt in the past 12 months.
Relates the use of methamphetamine to the time spent using it or feeling its effects.
Relates the use of methamphetamine to the time spent trying to get or getting methamphetamine.
